entry.title: Boston Fishackathon 2015
entry.content: I recently participated in the Boston Fishackathon! Check out the project that my team created here.

entry.title: Enhanced Steam Safari
entry.content:
A new coding project was added to the Code page.

This is a port of the Enhanced Steam extension to Safari. The project is stored here.

entry.title: iOS Project: Paint
entry.content:
A new coding project was added to the Code page.

This project was to create a Paint application in iOS. It was largely based on this tutorial.

I’m considering adding some more features like undo or figuring out a way to make the lines look smoother.

For the source code and documentation, click here

entry.title: Coding Project: Battleship (iOS)
entry.content:
A new coding project was added to the Code page.

This is an iOS project that was done for a class. The project was to recreate the game “Classic Battleships” (see here) on iOS.

For the source code and documentation, click here

entry.title: Sublime Text
entry.content:
Sublime Text is an awesome text editor that is fast, has a simple interface, and can be customized to your heart’s content. The following links walk through installing some of the more popular plugins.

Must-haves

  • Package Control – A Sublime Text Package Manager. Easily installs and updates Sublime Text plugins.
  • Soda Theme – The Dark Theme is so tasty.

References

  • http://blog.alexmaccaw.com/sublime-text
  • http://blog.generalassemb.ly/sublime-text-3-tips-tricks-shortcuts/
  • https://coderwall.com/p/ekwjca
  • http://www.slant.co/topics/197/~what-are-your-favorite-plugins-for-sublime-text-2
